tweet_text:

name: Chuck Fleischmann
tweet_text: Next, Congress should pass the Fix the Immigration Loopholes Act  — which I have co-sponsored —  to build on this effort and address the crisis at our southern border.

name: Chuck Fleischmann
tweet_text: Addressing the decades-old Flores agreement is a pivotal step to restoring integrity to our asylum process, combatting the rampant rise of human trafficking, and ensuring that bad actors do not impede the immigration process for credible asylum seekers.

name: Chuck Fleischmann
tweet_text: That is not lawful immigration, but manipulation of our system at the expense of innocent minors for a profit.

name: Chuck Fleischmann
tweet_text: This incentivized smugglers and human traffickers to fraudulently present themselves as families by exploiting migrant children, to which they had no relation, and using them as pawns in family asylum claims.

name: Chuck Fleischmann
tweet_text: Until now, the Flores Settlement Agreement required that family unit aliens be released after 20 days.

name: Chuck Fleischmann
tweet_text: @DHSMcAleenan @SecAzar By issuing the Flores final rule, border security personnel will be able to keep families together through the duration of their immigration proceedings while maintaining humanitarian care and housing standards.

name: Chuck Fleischmann
tweet_text: .@DHSMcAleenan and @SecAzar took appropriate action to terminate the Flores Settlement Agreement, a fundamental flaw in our immigration system that has been exploited by bad actors and fueled our immigration crisis.

tweet_text: 1. With lower tax rates at all income levels, Americans in every community will be able to keep more of their hard-earned money to save or spend as they see fit. In fact, a family of four earning the median family income will save about $2,000.

name: Chuck Fleischmann

name: Chuck Fleischmann
tweet_text: 4. After years of stagnant wages, this new tax code will finally help Americans get a raise. It will reward hard work and encourage investment in our communities to increase the growth of jobs, productivity, and paychecks for hardworking Americans nationwide. https://t.co/7flD6jfFD8

name: Chuck Fleischmann
tweet_text: 5. Not only will #taxreform protect American workers and stop jobs from moving overseas – it will help reestablish our nation as a 21st century magnet for job creation, innovation, and economic growth. (2/2) https://t.co/ypUZLy6bnC
